actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

actions.text: Provisions of Measure Incorporated Into H.R.1720.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that States which are unable to enforce payment of overdue child support by noncustodial parents must require such parents to perform public service employment sufficient to reimburse the government for the costs involved.

summary.text: Amends part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that States which are otherwise unable to enforce payment of overdue child support by noncustodial parents must require such parents to perform public service employment sufficient to reimburse the Federal and State governments for the costs attributable to such nonpayment of support.

titles.title: A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that States which are unable to enforce payment of overdue child support by noncustodial parents must require such parents to perform public service employment sufficient to reimburse the government for the costs involved.
